description: A widget to display a text. For images, use ImageView.

alignment.description: The horizontal alignment of the text.

markupEnabled.description:
Allows for a subset of HTML tags in the label text. Supported tags are: `a`, `del`, `ins`, `b`, `i`, `strong`, `em`, `big`, `small`, `br`. All tags must be closed (e.g. use `
` instead of `
`). Nesting tags is currently not supported. This property must be set in the "create" method.
